column3: aber a EWURADZE rebɛfa Elija ehum mu akɔ sor no
column4: Elija nye Elisha fi Gilgal sii mu kɔree."
tsintsim ha; na EWURADZE asoma me wɔ Bɛtɛl. Na Elisha see dɛ
column6: na wo kra tse ase yi
column7: mirinngya wo hɔ. Na wosii mu kɔr Bɛtɛl."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo mba a wɔwɔ Bɛtɛl no fiir edzi baa Elisha nkyɛn bebisaa no dɛ
column3: Ana inyim dɛ ndɛ EWURADZE rebɛfa wo wura efi wo tsir do akɔ a? Na ɔsee dɛ

column5: tsintsim ha; na EWURADZE asoma me Jeriko. Na ɔsee dɛ
column7: na wo kra tse ase yi
column8: mirinngya wo hɔ. Nna wɔbaa Jeriko."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo mba a wɔwɔ Jeriko no twee piin Elisha nkyɛn bebisaa no dɛ
column3: Ana inyim dɛ ndɛ EWURADZE rebɛfa wo wura efi wo tsir do akɔ a? Na obuaa dɛ

column4: tsintsim ha; na EWURADZE asoma me Jordan do. Na ɔsee dɛ
column6: na wo kra tse ase yi
column7: mirinngya wo hɔ. Na hɔn beenu no sii mu kɔree."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo mba no mu nyimpa eduonum sii mu kɔree kegyinagyinaa hɔn tsentsendo wɔ ekyirekyir: nna hɔn beenu no gyina Jordan ho."

column3: na ɔbobɔwee dze bɔɔ nsu no mu
column4: na ɔpaae kɔr ha na ha
column5: na hɔn beenu no nam asaase kɛsɛɛ do twae."

column6: ansaana wɔafa me efi wo nkyɛn akɔ. Na Elisha see dɛ
column8: ma wo sunsum kyɛfa mbɔho mbra mo do."

column3: Ebisa adze a ɔyɛ dzen: naaso sɛ ihu me aber a wɔrefa me efi wo nkyɛn a
column4: ɔbɛyɛ dɛm ama wo; na sɛ annyɛ dɛm a

column7: na ogya mpɔnkɔ a ɔbɛpaa hɔn beenu nyina ntamu no puei; na Elija nam ehum mu fowee kɔr sor."

column6: Israel ntseaseanam na no mpɔnkɔdofo e! Na oennhu no bio: na osuoo nankasa ne ntar mu

column2: "Ɔfaa Elija n'egukɔnmu no a ofi no ho gui no so
column3: na ɔsaan n'ekyir begyinaa Jordan nsukɔn do."

column2: "Na ɔfaa Elija n'egukɔnmu a ofi no ho gui no
column6: Elija Nyankopɔn no wɔ hen? Na aber a ɔno so bɔɔ nsu no mu no
column7: na ɔpaae kɔr ha na ha: na Elisa twae."

column2: "Na aber a nkɔnhyɛfo mba a wɔwɔ Jeriko wɔ ne tsentsendo hun no no
column4: Elija no sunsum edwir Elisha do. Na wɔbae behyiaa no
column5: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze butuuw famu wɔ n'enyim."
mbarimba a wɔyɛ dzen eduonum wɔ wo nkowaa nkyɛn; yɛserɛ wo
column6: ma wɔnkɔ nkɔhwehwɛ wo wura: bɛyɛ na bi a EWURADZE no sunsum no ama no do kɔ dze no akɔto bepɔw bi do
column7: anaa ɔbɔn bi mu. Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na aber a wɔhyɛɛ no ara ma ɔyɛɛ no ahomtsew no
column4: Hom nsoma ɛ. Dɛm ntsi wɔsomaa mbarimba eduonum; na wɔkɔhwehwɛe ara ndaansa

column3: mber a otsintsimii wɔ Jeriko no; na ɔsee hɔn dɛ

column2: "Na kurow no mu mbarimba no see Elisha dɛ
column5: kurow yi ne dabea yɛ fɛw
column6: dɛ mbrɛ mo wura hu yi: na nsu no dze onnye
column7: na asaase no so pon mba."

column4: na wɔmfa nkyen ngu mu. Na wɔdze brɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ofiir edzi kɔr nsu no no nsunyiwa no ho
column6: Masa nsu yi yarba; owu anaa mbapon bi rimmfi mu mmba bio."

column2: "Nna wɔsaa nsu no yarba dze bodu ndɛ da yi
column3: dɛ Elisha n'asɛm a ɔkae no ara."

column2: "Na ofii hɔ sii mu kɔr Bɛtɛl: na aber a ɔnam kwan no do rofow akɔ no
column3: mbofra nkakraba fi kurow no mu puei besii no atwetwe see no dɛ
na ɔdze EWURADZE ne dzin paa hɔn. Na nsisiber beenu fi kwaa no mu bae bɛtsetseew hɔn mu mbofra eduanan ebien."

column2: "Na ofii hɔ kɔr bepɔw Karmel do
column3: na ofii hɔ so sanee kɔr Samaria."
